articles.title: 'It's a big, scary mess': 12 million Americans to lose jobless aid after Christmas if Congress fails to act - USA TODAY
articles.description: Millions of Americans may suddenly be cut off from their jobless benefits the day after Christmas if Congress fails to extend relief programs soon.
articles.content:
A new coronavirus stimulus deal is still in the works between Democrats and Republicans, bu they can't agree on a conclusion.
USA TODAY
